snippet: A New Jersey man who said he was high on drugs and hearing voices when he fatally beat an elderly man with a sauce pan has been convicted of murder....

headline.print_headline: Man Convicted of Murder in Fatal Sauce Pan Beating
headline.main: Man Convicted of Murder in Fatal Sauce Pan Beating

lead_paragraph: A New Jersey man who said he was high on drugs and hearing voices when he fatally beat an elderly man with a sauce pan has been convicted of murder.
